Holiday Money Get in touch Book a video call Make an enquiry Call 0800 713 715 Help Get in touch Back KIDS PLAY FREE* ALL MEALS AT JEAN-MICHEL COUSTEAU View gallery / Back Jean Michel Aerial Jean Michel Kayaks Jean Michel Pool JMC Aerial View Fiji Jean-Michel Cousteau Resort Fiji - Savusavu &vert; 7 Nights • Transfers Overview Inclusions Room Type Terms & Conditions Surrounded by world-renowned, brilliantly coloured pristine reefs, a marine sanctuary, deserted beaches, tropical gardens and an authentic living culture, Jean-Michel Cousteau Resort Fiji blends the best of eco-friendly self-sustainable living with 5-star natural luxury and legendary hospitality and cuisine. Whether you’re planning a romantic escape, a much-needed family getaway, a multi generation celebration, a diving holiday or just some downtime, Jean-Michel Cousteau Resort Fiji has it all. Your home will be one of the 24 premium thatched bures which showcase the perfect balance of traditional Fijian architecture with contemporary furnishings and amenities. You will be impressed by the culinary excellence with intimate dinners or a private island gourmet picnic, plus the ideal blend of relaxing, experiential and authentic cultural activities. Relax and re-centre the mind, body and soul by joining one of the complimentary early morning yoga sessions. Get ready to drift away from daily distractions and into new found euphoria. Parents love the educational kids club and the mini resort within the resort dedicated to families, plus the free nanny for each child under 6 and the buddy's for 6-12 year olds. Jean-Michel Cousteau Resort participate in the Loloma Hour, dubbed "The world's first happy hour for the environment". The resort is offering cultural awareness programmes and coral reef rehabilitation. For more information about Loloma Hour and what it offers click HERE . View more View less 7 nights + transfers & more from $ 5299 per person share twin. Flights are additional. KIDS PLAY FREE* ALL MEALS AT JEAN-MICHEL COUSTEAU Enquire now Sale Period : until 31 Mar 26 by 4pm or until sold out Deal Includes 5 nights accommodation at Jean-Michel Cousteau Resort 2 nights accommodation at Fiji Gateway Hotel (pre/post) Return Nadi Airport & Savusavu Airport transfers Jean-Michel Cousteau Resort Fiji Inclusions Breakfast, lunch & dinner daily FREE non-alcoholic beverages (excluding mocktails), tea, coffee & afternoon tea FREE Wi-Fi *KIDS play FREE (6-12yrs, at the Bula Club) FREE Fijian buddy for KIDS (6-12yrs, maximum 1-5 ratio) FREE nanny for KIDS (0-5yrs) FREE nanny service 6.30pm-9pm (0-5yrs, one per room) FREE daily family & adult snorkel trips with resident marine biologists or activity staff, snorkel equipment, yoga, daily evening entertainment FREE wash & fold laundry service daily BONUS Travel between 01 Nov-19 Dec 25 & 01 Jan-31 Mar 26 and received 2 x 1 Tank dives and 2 x 1 Hour Bobo massage per bure Room Types Garden View Bure Bask in the gentle island breezes through screened louvres, framing panoramic views of lush greenery and colorful blooms across vast lawns. Perfect for couples or families with up to two children, these bures provide a peaceful tropical retreat, allowing you to fully embrace the essence of island bliss. 7 night accommodation package from $5499 per person share twin Additional nights from $1045 per person share twin Kids stay FREE (2-11yrs, Max 2) Travel 20 Dec 25 - 15 Jan 26 7 night accommodation package from $5299 per person share twin Additional nights from $1005 per person share twin Kids stay FREE (2-11yrs, Max 2) Travel 01 Dec - 19 Dec 25, 16 Jan - 25 Jan 26 Oceanfront Bure Experience oceanfront tranquility in our Fijian-style Oceanfront Bures. Unwind in a warm, inviting atmosphere as you relax in a double hammock, watching breathtaking sunsets over the stunning Savusavu Bay. 7 night accommodation package from $6849 per person share twin Additional nights from $1319 per person share twin Travel 20 Dec 25 - 15 Jan 26 7 night accommodation package from $6549 per person share twin Additional nights from $1259 per person share twin Travel 01 Dec - 19 Dec 25, 16 Jan - 25 Jan 26 If the advertised room type doesn't suit, or you'd like to travel outside the advertised dates, please ask us for a customised quote below. Terms & Conditions Sales to 31 Mar 26 or until sold out. Prices correct as at 02 May 25. • Prices are thereafter subject to change without notice until time of confirmation. Prices may vary due to a number of factors including tax and surcharge increases and availability. • Package prices for accommodation and transfers are land only. International and domestic flights are additional. All travel must be commenced and completed as specified. • Bedding configurations may vary. • Any resort credits that are unused are not refundable, transferable & cannot be exchanged for cash. • Food and Beverage credits must be used onsite at their Restaurant and Bar. • Min/max stays apply. • Full payment is required at time of booking. • Availability during holiday & peak travel periods may be limited. • Amendment and cancellation fees apply. • Accommodation ratings are based on House of Travel ratings and are a guide only to the overall quality of the property. • Packages are subject to availability. Please talk to your House of Travel consultant for the most up to date availability and pricing. Advertised prices are per person (twin share) based on payment by cash or eftpos. Credit card fees will apply. FINANCE CONDITIONS: Lending criteria, fees, terms & conditions apply. Offer available for bookings made with House of Travel only. Not available for bookings made with MixandMatch. Click here for finance terms and conditions.
